ing: 1 (2.25 ounce) can black olives, drained and chopped
des: "Flavored cream cheese spread on lunch meat of choice, rolled up, and sliced into pinwheels secured with toothpicks."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together cream cheese, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, sweet pickles and black olives. Chill in the refrigerator until ready to use.
